description: Include testing as an optional step within each task during implementation. Build and test incrementally rather than all testing at the end.

notes.problem: Testing often deferred to end, leading to compound bugs
notes.desired_behavior: Each task optionally includes test step
implementation_options: Add test_step field to task schema in plan.json
Include 'verify' sub-task for each main task
Flag in plan template: include_incremental_tests: true/false
